original_text: And when I could not see for the glory of that light, being led by the hand of them that were with me, I came into Damascus.
korean_text: 나는 그 빛의 광채로 말미암아 볼 수 없게 되었으므로 나와 함께 있는 사람들의 손에 끌려 다메섹에 들어갔노라

sentences.original_text: And when I could not see
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 내가 볼 수 없었을 때

sentences.original_text: for the glory of that light
of them that were with me
